name: The UK Oil and Gas Industry Association Limited
memberOrga: You can find our member organisations, ordered by contractor, operator and associate here: https://oilandgasuk.co.uk/membership.cfm
goal: Our aim is to strengthen the long-term health of the offshore oil and gas industry in the United Kingdom by working closely with companies across the sector, governments and all other stakeholders to address the issues that affect your business.
interests: Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Energy Policy
Health & Safety
Environment
Brexit negotiations and associated legislation
